reviewText: I am a Reiki Master and have used all programs in the series.  Very pleased with them.  I'm sure some Reiki Masters will not be at one with this attunement program because it let's anybody that is ready to take the Master Attunement, receive it and learn how to use the Master symbol.  Some Reiki Masters have charged $500.00 to $10,000 for a Reiki Master attunement. I'm sure this program will cause controversy for that alone. But, as I said before I do not have an ego problem or feel bad about the fee I paid...for my Master Attunement. I hope thousands of people become new Reiki Masters.  World would be a much better place.peace

reviewText: Just like Steve Murrays DVD's for Reiki Levels 1 and 2, his DVD for Reiki Master also delivers what it claims to. After such success with the DVD's for 1st and 2nd Levels I couldn't wait to receive the Master Attunement. My two children, ages 28 and 30 have always come to me for healing energy and positive energy when dealing with crisis in their lives or there small children, so for them I wanted to continue on my quest for knowledge and connection to the Source as well as to help myself with health issues as well as others, not to leave out the animal kingdom. As I recieved the attunement I also received a vision and spiritual knowledge about my life on a level I had never reached before. Having been a meditator for years and having many, many visions this surprised me, especially the clarity and profound impact of the vision then and now. Within one week of receiving the Attunement I received a call from my daughter, her niece, born that morning,  was in serious trouble and it was not known if she would survive. Since my daughter and her new niece live several states away from me I began to follow the procedure for Long Distance Reiki (which I learned from Steve Murrays' Reiki Ultimate Guide, another excellent purchase choice.) Later that day I spoke with my daughter and asked how her niece was, she told me that within 45 minutes of my sending the Reikie she did a complete turn about and was off oxygen out of the tents and off the computer hook-ups. This is powerful, and real, I know. This was not the only incident, my son in Finland called me to ask me to send positive energy for a very important job interview. Again, I followed the procedure for Long Distance Reiki along with everything else I had learned. I believe with the additional power of the Master Symbol received from the DVD, once again I watched another little miracle unfold. My son was offered the job he'd always dreamed of. And fast! They couldn't get him hired fast enough. All of this, and he still doesn't graduate for another 2 months. I can't explain it, all I know is you will receive what Steve Murray say's you will and that is the Reiki Master Attunement. This has definitely increased my abilities tenfold and continues to as I continue to view the DVD over and over again.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Since I bought and took Steve's entire course, my review for the Master DVD will read close to my review for Vol. 1 and 2 - due to having the same great experience with ALL his books and DVD's.  I have studied Reiki with teachers in person and online for over 10 years, having been "Mastered" first in 2004.  THIS DVD, as the first and second also did, were some of the first times I found myself trusting in the process of energy passing from one moment to another for the sake of "attunement" or the like.  There was something magickal about the idea that I had to trust in this process due to it being a DVD and not a human standing right next to me.  It made me go deeper into the "attunement" process.  Most humans charge an arm and a leg simply to stand there anyway - and that doesn't "make" for a 'perfect' attuenment.  I found no difference in learning the Master set of symbols from a DVD and Book Course, than I did from a person in the same room as me.  EXCEPT that with Steve's course - I felt more connected to this learning.  I had to bring more of myself to the table and trust myself to do the learning.  IS that his personal energy attached to his course, I don't know?  I would think so, he is open, honest and straight forward to teaching the wonders of Reiki.  Greatly empowering YOU to be the best YOU can be within this wonderful healing art.  You are not alone, you can email him questions and he will respond.  It's true, not all people are going to have the same wonderful experience that I [and others] did.  This is simply what Reiki is all about, each of us having a togetherness connection to the Reiki Energy source itself, while ALSO having our own experiences learning about how to harness and use it.  This is what I've learned most from Steve; his books and DVD's have opened my heart and mind like no other Reiki teacher I've worked with.  I'm very happy I bought and took his courses.
summary: This wonderful DVD is only the beginning...
Title: N/A

reviewText: Receiving the final master symbol is wonderful and I love what it means, "God shine on me, be my friend."  I also love the end of the attunement when I not only saw but felt the vortex of light energy flooding down, using my body as the tunnel, from the heavens through me to the earth. The innermost colors were transparent but there was lots of gold, then yellow and some orange and it was all outlined in red.  Then there were these silver stars streams projecting out in multi-curving swirls--like streamers at a birthday party and it felt like they were doing a dance of joy looking back on it now.  And then, when I was told to reverse the light taking it from the ground back up into heaven, I remember not wanting to but doing it, and it was equally as pleasant however, I must admit at that moment I wanted it to go on for a long time. Experiencing this was truly amazing.I have enjoyed my journey of healing as I have had a healing gift that I realized was definitely there after I became a mother.  I had a hard time with it because when someone I loved was hurt, I'd do a healing on them and it would take just about everything out of me to the point of making me feel sick and depressed--as if I had taken on all their pain.  But I would come back around to feeling better that same day.  It was so draining though but I  "had" to do it.  I'm so glad Reiki has found me and I've found Reiki through these dvd's at Amazon, by Steve Murray to know there IS a way to heal that I can help them without exhausting myself but actually healing myself simultaneously! What a find! Thank God! Also I am a nursing student and if I had continued to heal the way I was healing, I would have eventually either burned out or made myself sick for sure.Since my first Reiki attunement (which was the Psychic one) until now, I have grown in more ways than I can ever say or am probably even capable of expressing anyway.  I can tell you that I have experienced a new, fresh, invigorating, spirit-filled, peaceful completeness in my life.  A more relaxed and trusting spirit in my heart of, not just myself, but of all those I have loved, love, and will ever love! I've done one "clinical" attunement on someone besides myself since my master attunement and it was so incredible you wouldn't believe.  I'll never forget it.Mr. Murray says the Master Attunement is the most powerful attunement of all.  What do I say? It is God who is powerful and I was so happy to hear Steve mention God in this attunement.  It has been an enjoyable process, but for me, what I've learned most is what I knew all the time--acknowledging and keeping God in not only the entire process of Reiki, but in my daily walk of life, is the key for me.  I truly believe Reiki is just one more of God's boundless means to make His love manifest for all people willing to receive it. He's everywhere and through prayer, and in  Reiki in every kind of touch--not just a complete "session" but also the touches we do each day: a handshake, a hug, a pat or rub on the back, and through the eyes as well, especially in a smile. Simple. Universal love. Thank you, Steve for following your heart and sharing Reiki so that we may learn and share it also and spread the power of healing love throughout the universe. o8ESoar!

reviewText: Anyone the heals with Reiki and has not yet become attuned to the Reiki symbols should get Steve's Reiki 2nd Level Attunement Learn and Use the Reiki Sacred Symbols and become attuned to them.  Then, without a doubt, get this Reiki Master Attunement - Become a Reiki Master as soon as you feel you are ready.  The surge in Reiki that you will channel is phenomenal, with the results in your healing as proof.  Everyone that has a desire to help and heal others should consider becoming a Reiki Master, and Steve Murray's DVD is the most expedient path to this end.  I am channeling Reiki to people that can feel the difference, and I will always remember that Steve brought this to me.  It has changed my life!
summary: What a gift to give yourself!

reviewText: Steve Murray's Reiki Attunement DVD programs are very well done. He takes the Reiki student from Level I to Master Attunements in easy to follow steps.The Reiki Master Level Atttunement DVD is just as powerful as an Attunement in person. Steve patiently explains the process, the last Usui Reiki Master symbol, and takes the viewer through the Master Level Attunement.When my sister and I watched the Reiki Level I, II, and Master attunement DVD's, Both of us could feel the power of the attunements, and commented to each other,that we could feel heat and tingling in our hands. The Master Level Attunement was so powerful, I could feel a breeze on the back of my neck, and my 6th & 7th Chakras were pulsating.This is a great resource to those that don't have access or money to go to a local Reiki Master for their Attunements. Buy this DVD and feel the heat!
summary: Become a Reiki Master - Just as powerful as an "in Person" attunement
